name: Sneka The Snake
description:
Sneka The Snake (by S'Kleer)

Description
A small game about a snake named Sneka. Sneka must eat apples in order to grow big and strong. At first glance, this may seem quite simple, but Sneka has a rather strong metebolism, and therefore she should eat 4 apples every 10 seconds. As it grows, Sneka also gains strength and begins to crawl faster and faster. Can Sneka overcome all 5 levels and not die of hunger?

Features 
* Each eaten apple adds some time
* Each eaten apple  increases speed slightly
* You can cross the level border a bit (Otherwise, you will die)
* You should not touch the walls and your segments (Otherwise, you will die)
* The game is very random. If your time runs out quickly, then after a few attempts it may be that there will be too much time :D
* The game is written in 20 completely unreadable lines of code :D  

Controls
* Left, right to turn Sneka
* Alt + Enter to fullscreen
